name: Wizard's Way
description:
In Wizard's Way play as a wizard as he ascends his tower to give power to ancient seals.

Features

  • Three different levels to play through, the first two teach you the basics of the game.
  • Switch between two different versions levels to reach the goal.
  • Combines quick platforming with on the spot puzzle solving.

Developed by: Ryan Carpenter

NOTE: This is a student submitted prototype, not a finished product. So expect it to be rough around the edges.
